name: Project Pastorate
description: Project Pastorate is a visual novel set in the land of crime and sin that needs to be cleansed. Such tasks are taken up by the Devoters, the special service whose main purpose is to preserve the safety of the country, and the Pastor â€” leader of this post-apocalyptic community.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista\Windows 7 Processor: 1.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compliant
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista\Windows 7\Windows 8\Windows 10 Processor: 1.4+ Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Better than Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compliant
